item.title: Alcoholism
item.description: An alcoholic is one whose problematic patter n of alcohol use leads to clinically significant impairment or distress, manifested by multiple psychosocial, behavioural or physiological features.

item.title: Obesity
item.description: A BMI >$30 kg/m^3$ Obesity is a chronic condition characterized by the accumulation of excess body fat, leading to adverse health effects.

item.title: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
item.description: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) is a complex autoimmune disease that can affect multiple organs and systems in the body. It is a Type III hypersensitivity reaction.
